name: Danganronpa: Hope's End
description:
After the death of Junko Enoshima. Worshippers of Junko start their own killing games, as to make Junko proud.

Welcome to Danganronpa: Hope's End! This is a Danganronpa fan project with no affiliation to Spike Chungsoft whatsoever, it is a non-profit project and is made in RPG Maker VX Ace! Follow Hamari Yui and her classmates as they're forced into a killing game to fight for their lives.

Join our discord: https://discord.gg/vfHTg5Kx8t #fangame #adventure #puzzle

Director - Catster

Co-Directors: Blushin Ret, SlushiiVA, фінні
